pages.text: $(li)The Blaze Rod is a hot item that has diverses uses.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft multiple items like Blaze Powder, Brewing Stand, Infernal Paintings, Blaze Lanterns and End Rods.$(br)$(li)Blazes and Wildifres may drop it on death.
$(li)It can be placed in a Furnace, Smoker, Blast Furnace, or Kiln to burn up to 12 items too.$(br2)Insert a picture of the Furnace and the Blaze Rod
